name: places/ChIJc38x2q1ZwokRW8WWSwcCxpE
formattedAddress: 225 W 34th St., New York, NY 10123, USA
adrFormatAddress: 225 W 34th St., New York, NY 10123, USA

originalText.text:
I recently had an amazing experience at my eyeglass appointment. The staff at this place was highly professional, and their level of expertise was truly impressive. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warm smiles and a welcoming atmosphere. The staff members were not only courteous but also very friendly, making me feel comfortable throughout the entire process.
What impressed me the most was their extensive knowledge of all the products and services they offered. They were able to answer all of my questions and provide me with valuable insights to help me make the best decision for my eyeglasses. Their attention to detail and willingness to go the extra mile truly made a difference.
I would highly recommend this place to my friends and family. The staff's professionalism, friendliness, and expertise make it a top-notch destination for anyone in need of eyeglasses. I left feeling confident in my choice and excited to share my positive experience with others. Thank you to the entire team for making my eyeglass appointment a truly exceptional one. Special thanks to Jasmine!

originalText.text:
1. They charge roughly $1,000 for a pair of glasses and an eye exam, and refuse to offer any cancellations despite calling minutes later.

2. I traveled into the city on Sunday to pick up my glasses, but they were just closed during their normal hours (photo attached).

I’m sorry, even with the Groupon, I will never be coming back.

originalText.text: The staff was extremely kind and helpful. I haven't been to the eye doctor in over 10 years. They made the process go extremely smooth both while picking out my frames and while performing the eye exam. I'm grateful for their time, their help, and their personalities.

text.text: The staff was extremely kind and helpful. I haven't been to the eye doctor in over 10 years. They made the process go extremely smooth both while picking out my frames and while performing the eye exam. I'm grateful for their time, their help, and their personalities.

originalText.text: I am traveling for work and forgot a spare contact, (I’m mono-vision), it was only going to be a few days over the 30, and then my trip was extended. Jasmine was able to set aside a pair of contacts in my prescription since I had a copy of it, and pick up was a breeze. Both ladies were lovely and easy to interact with. I went from panic mode to a fresh contact and a spare for my next 10 days!

I went from panic mode to a fresh contact and a spare for my next 10 days!

originalText.text: This location is wonderful.I used a Groupon voucher for a great deal around the holidays. From when I initially booked,the front staff (Jasmin and Elizabeth) were professional, extremely transparent with what to expect on my visit and what to bring to my appointment.Doctor Elizabeth was so thorough with what changed in my vision and they even gave me the option for getting my eyes dilated to check my overall eve health for only $50.I left there so happy with my service and my visit , I would highly recommend to come here for any eye related appointments.You won’t be disappointed.
